title: Bill Announcement â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
December 17, 2020
On Thursday, December 17, 2020, the President signed into law:H.R. 4975, which designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1201 Sycamore Square Drive in Midlothian, Virginia, as the Dorothy Braden Bruce Post Office Building;H.R. 5062, which designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 9930 Conroy Windermere Road in Windermere, Florida, as the Officer Robert German Post Office Building; andH.R. 5307, which designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 115 Nicol Avenue in Thomasville, Alabama, as the Postmaster Robert Ingram Post Office.
